item.title: Which Volvo Should You Buy?
item.description: A guide to choosing the right Volvo model, comparing features, reliability, and value to help make an informed and practical car-buying decision.

media:content.media:title: Which Volvo Should You Buy?
media:content.media:description: A guide to choosing the right Volvo model, comparing features, reliability, and value to help make an informed and practical car-buying decision.

item.title: 6 Used Cars Worth Considering
item.description: A guide to six reliable used cars, backed by over 20 years of automotive experience, highlighting value, dependability, and practical ownership tips.

item.title: Check Underneath Before Buying a Car
item.description: Tips on inspecting a car’s underside before purchase, highlighting potential issues, rust, and maintenance concerns to make a safer, informed buying decision.

item.title: What Cars People Drove in the 1980s
item.description: A nostalgic look at popular cars from the 1980s, highlighting common models, driving trends, and what everyday vehicles were like during the decade.

item.title: 300K-Mile Chrysler Town & Country Review
item.description: An in-depth look at a Chrysler Town & Country with 300,000 miles, examining reliability, wear, and how well it has held up over time.

item.title: Common Car Buying Mistakes
item.description: A guide highlighting frequent mistakes people make before buying a car, offering tips to avoid issues and make informed, practical vehicle choices.

item.title: Handling Rough Bumps in a Vehicle
item.description: A vehicle is driven over rough bumps to evaluate suspension performance and ride comfort, highlighting adjustments and handling techniques for a smoother experience.

item.title: Testing Vehicle Suspension by Bouncing
item.description: A vehicle’s suspension is tested by bouncing it, demonstrating how to check shock absorption, stability, and overall handling performance safely.

item.title: Helping My Daughter Get a Honda Pilot
item.description: A Honda Pilot is chosen for its reliability and versatility, highlighting features and practical reasons it makes a great family SUV.

item.title: Audi Q5 Breaks Down on Road Trip
item.description: An Audi Q5 experiences a breakdown during a road trip, with troubleshooting steps and solutions explored to safely restore the vehicle’s performance.

item.title: $2400 Car Repair Still Not Fixed
item.description: A vehicle repair costing $2,400 is examined after failing to resolve the issue, highlighting troubleshooting steps and insights into persistent automotive problems.

item.title: Car Issue Fixed Successfully
item.description: A vehicle problem is diagnosed and resolved, showing the steps taken to repair it and restore proper function efficiently and safely.

item.title: Finding the Source of a Ford Explorer Smell
item.description: A Ford Explorer develops an unpleasant odor, and the investigation focuses on locating the source and explaining practical steps to diagnose and fix it.

item.title: Powerful V12 with Wiring Issues
item.description: A V12 engine is examined, highlighting its performance potential while identifying and troubleshooting wiring problems that affect reliability and function.

item.title: GX460 Fix: Solving the Car Sickness Issue
item.description: A practical look at what caused this GX460 to feel unsettled on the road and how the real issue was diagnosed. Clear insight into the repair and how it improves ride comfort and stability.

item.title: Fixing a Hard Top Leak
item.description: A practical look at diagnosing a leaking hard top. Clear guidance on common causes, what to inspect, and how proper maintenance can prevent water from getting inside.

item.title: Why This VW Golf Stands Out
item.description: A practical look at what makes this Volkswagen Golf perform well, from reliability to overall condition. Clear insights into why it leaves a strong impression in everyday driving and maintenance.

item.title: 10 Essential Tips Every Car Owner Should Know
item.description: Practical guidance on simple habits and checks that help keep a vehicle running smoothly. Clear, easy-to-follow tips that support better maintenance and fewer unexpected repairs.

item.title: Why This Car Needed a New Engine
item.description: A clear explanation of the issues that led to replacing an engine. Practical insight into what failed, why the repair was necessary, and what drivers can learn about long-term maintenance.

item.title: Traveling to Avoid a Costly Dealer Scam
item.description: A practical look at how a buyer avoided an expensive dealer situation by traveling out of state. Clear insight into what happened and what to watch for when shopping for a used vehicle.
